title: Shabu Shabu
description: Serves meat, veg options available. A sushi restaurant with an all-you-can-eat concept for a set price, where you order from a menu and they make it to order. There are plenty of vegan choices, at least 15, and include seaweed nori, vegetarian rolls, fried tofu, inari tofu sushi and corn gunkan-maki, as well as several fried vegetables.
streetAddress: Rua Regimento 19 da Infantaria, Edificio Baia Center, Loja 26 - 2 Piso
